/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with towering buildings, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky and the green of the trees contrasting with the more muted tones of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and dimension, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the frame, looking down at the city below.
